exercise.question: Question 1: Wonder, drawing, stares, Gran, puppy
exercise.answer:
1) Wonder: to have a wish to know something 
Example sentences:
 1) I wonder how would my result be.
2) I was looking at my sister with wonder.
 2) Drawing: making a picture with a pencil or a pen 
Example sentences: 
1) I made a very colourful drawing.
2) Her drawing was very beautiful. 
3) Stares: To look at someone for a long time 
Example sentences: 
1) My father stares at me when I do not complete my homework. 
2) She gave me a cold stare
4) Gran: grandmother 
Example sentences:
 1) My gran makes delicious food. 
2) Gran always loves her grandchildren.
5) Puppy: a young dog 
Example sentences:

 2) Robinson was a very cheerful puppy.

exercise.question:
• Act out the story. Play the parts of the monkey, the wise woman and the mother, in turns in the classroom. 
• What would you do if you had a magic wand? I would turn it round and round and turn a book into a _________________. I would turn a dog into a _________________. I would turn a pencil into a _________________. I would turn you into a _________________.
exercise.answer:
Disclaimer: These are sample answers. Students are advised to write the answers based on their own experience and observation. 
• Monkey: I look so simple. I wish I could look like a giraffe. 
• Wise Woman: If that is you wish, let me give you a magic wand that will fulfil any of your wish. 
• Monkey: Oh wow! You are so kind. Thank you very much. Magic wand! Turn me into a giraffe. whizzzz! 
• Wise Woman: Your wish has been granted. You now look so tall. 
• Monkey: Let me see myself in the mirror. Oh No! My neck and tail does not match with each other. I look so ugly. It is very uncomfortable for me to walk with this long neck. 
• Mother: Son! I already told you that you are unique in your own self. 
• Monkey: I should have listened to you. Magic wand! Please turn me back into a monkey. 
• Wise Woman: You are back again. You look so wonderful! 
• If I had a magic wand, I would turn myself into a Superman and help all the people in their tough time. I would fly to any part of the world and help them solve their problems. 
 I would turn it round and round and turn a book into a pizza. I would turn a dog into a puppy. I would turn a pencil into a music system. I would turn you into a fairy.
